txt.en: As Colbert the Mad hinted, you have encountered some odd-looking mounds during your exploration of the Fields of Fornost.\n\nYou should dig and see if there is anything worth finding buried in this strange ground.
You have encountered some odd-looking relics during your exploration of the Fields of Fornost.
The digging was dangerous work in disturbed and sullied earth, but you uncovered some valuables just the same. You are richer for your troubles.
The digging was dangerous work in disturbed and sullied earth, but you uncovered some valuables just the same. You are richer for your troubles.
The strange mounds of earth can be found north of Mincham's Camp, in the Fields of Fornost.\n\nYou should dig at the strange piles of earth.
The strange mounds of earth can be found north of Mincham's Camp, in the Fields of Fornost.\n\nYou should dig at the strange piles of earth.
